name: Discover London and London will surprise you!!!
description: This trip will let you discover this wonderful city --- London!! We will visit the amazing museums and the special art galleries. We also will visit some historical attractions. I will tell you some interesting backgrounds and stories about these places. During this trip, you will know more about the culture, art, history of London! In addition, I will take you to see some beautiful landscape of London. You can feel the natural beauty of London. I can take some good photos for you. Moreover, we can go to some local traditional restaurants to enjoy the British food. This trip can provide you more knowledge about London and some good views of London.
